When using a servlet to handle an error page, the javax.servlet.error.exception
request attribute is not the actual Throwable object, but rather the Class of
that object.

The error is on line 514 of file:
   org/apache/catalina/core/StandardWrapperValve.java

I patched it on my system with the following lines of code:

            sreq.setAttribute(Globals.EXCEPTION_ATTR, realError);

BTW, the code on line 518 can be simplified as:

	    sreq.setAttribute(Globals.EXCEPTION_TYPE_ATTR,
			      realError.getClass());

-Bryan
